ygData.msgSnippet: Inside the fortress, Rat Trap makes a run for his life, as fast as his tiny paws could carry him.  He didn t know what he would meet at the other end, yet,

Inside the fortress, Rat Trap makes a run for his life, as fast as his tiny=
 paws could carry him.  He didn't know what he would meet at the other end,=
 yet, right now, getting out was the only thing on his mind.

"Gotta get ou=
ta here, gotta get outa here!  I am sooooo outa here!"

He rambles on as he=
 scampers quickly to saftey.

Outside the Ark, Night Shift and Straight Sho=
t quickly help Noctorro, by assisting in moving Tucson, who was quite large=
r than they were. Yet, despite their help, Tucson, being as determined as h=
e was, despite his bad condition, slowly resists their help, and manages to=
 get on one knee, with one foot on the ground.  Night Shift looks at him as=
 does Straight Shot.

" Woah, easy Tucson, easy.  Haven't ya noticed?  You'=
re losn' a lotta battery fluid real fast. That aint just a scratch on your =
arm buddy."

Tucson sighs.

"I - do not wish to burden anyone.  I - started=
 this, and I feel that I should help finish what I began.  I - can not expe=
ct anyone to risk their lives on - my account."

Straight Shot eyes him.

"=
 Tucson, we're helping you because we want to.  And right now you can use a=
ll the help you can get.  Look, what would Talon do without ya?  Ya can't l=
et her down, ya gotta preserve what life ya got, because when this is all o=
ver, you two are going to have something wonderful ta share in the future. =
 Ya wanna live ta see that right?"

He nodds.

"And indeed, I - will."

Str=
aight Shot eyes him deeper.

"And now, you are gonna let Noctorro and us he=
lp ya, by getting you ta saftey so you can get that arm repaired and replac=
e the battery fluid you lost on the battle field.  Plus, we gotta move outa=
 here real fast, because something big is gonna happen real soon."

Tucson =
nodds.

" All right.  Let's - regroup, as Noctorro has advised."

As he tri=
es to stand up, he finds his condition too far advanced, as he falls to his=
 knees once more, unable to get up on his own.  He finds just enough energy=
 to get into vehicle mode, seeing that this way, at least he could be towwe=
d to saftey, rolling on wheels rather than being dragged, which would be di=
fficult to do otherwise.

" Here- in - this mode, it will - be easier for m=
e - to ambulate."

At the Ark, Uproar and Quickstride nodd in compliance.  =
They were ready for the challenge.  They transform into their robot modes a=
s Uproar begins to sharpen his claws, while Quickstride cracks his knuckles=
.  The young cat now bares an enthusiastic look on his face.

" All right, =
I'm ready ta do this sir.  No matter what happens, there's no turning tail.=
"

Quickstride also nodds.

"That's right, no turning tail.  It'll be like =
old times.."
